spell.name: Thoughtvision
entries: Target a willing creature within range. For the duration, your mind is opened to them, and you can project into their consciousness a series of moving or still images. You can choose to share a memory, a vision, or any mental picture you form in your mind. The target sees what you send them, and can perceive the emotions you experience while focusing on that image. The spell ends if the target is ever unwilling, or out of range.
